info.title: Public API
info.description: Public API endpoints for user consumption. Release version: v1.9.6.1

post.description: Deploys an application, making it active and running.
Undeploys an application, stopping all running instances.

get.description: Retrieves historical statistics for an application including CPU, RAM, traffic, latency, and volume usage over a specified time period.
Retrieves comprehensive status overview for an application including latency, CPU/RAM usage, active instances, regions, and cost information.

200.description: Application status overview was successfully retrieved.

post.description: Creates a new application with the specified configuration including containers, volumes, region settings, and autoscaling.

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

get.description: Lists all applications for the authenticated user with their current status.

patch.description: Partially updates an existing application using JSON Merge Patch semantics. Only provided fields will be updated; existing fields not included in the request will remain unchanged. For arrays (containers, volumes, endpoints), items with matching IDs will be updated, items without IDs will be added as new, and items not included will be deleted.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The ID of the application to update

requestBody.description: Partial application configuration with only the fields to update

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

put.description: Updates an existing application with full replacement of all configuration fields.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The ID of the application to update

400.description: Invalid input or application ID mismatch.

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

404.description: Application is not found by this ID.

delete.description: Deletes an application and all its associated resources including deployments, services, and volumes.

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

post.description: Triggers a restart of all pods for the specified application.

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

get.description: Retrieves the current autoscaling settings for an application, including minimum and maximum replica counts.

put.description: Updates the autoscaling settings for an application, including minimum and maximum replica counts.

403.description: User has invalid card or is suspended.

get.description: Lists all container registries configured for the authenticated user.

post.description: Add a container registry for user.
Searches for public container images in a registry by prefix.
Lists all container images available in a private registry.

put.description: Updates an existing container registry configuration including credentials.

get.description: Retrieves a specific container registry by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a container registry. Returns an error if the registry is currently in use by any applications.

200.description: Container registry was deleted or conflict returned.

post.description: Lists all available tags for a specific container image.

200.description: Container image tags were successfully retrieved.

post.description: Retrieves the digest information for a specific container image tag.

200.description: Container image tag digest was successfully retrieved.

post.description: Gets recommended configuration for a container image including endpoint configurations and environment variables.

put.description: Replaces all environment variables for a container template. All existing environment variables will be removed and replaced with the provided set.

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: The ID of the container template

requestBody.description: A JSON object where each key is the variable name and each value is the variable value

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

404.description: Application or container template not found.

patch.description: Partially updates a container template within an application. Only provided fields will be updated; existing fields not included in the request will remain unchanged.

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: The ID of the container template to update

requestBody.description: Partial container template configuration with only the fields to update

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

404.description: Application or container template not found.

get.description: Gets a container template within an application.

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: The ID of the container template

404.description: Application or container template not found.

delete.description: Deletes a container template from an application.

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: The ID of the container template to delete

400.description: Cannot delete the last container template.

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

404.description: Application or container template not found.

post.description: Adds a new container template to an application.

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

put.description: Update an existing endpoint for given application

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The display name of the endpoint to update

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

404.description: Application, container, or endpoint not found.

delete.description: Delete endpoint of a container for given application.

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The ID of the endpoint to delete

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

get.description: List endpoints from all containers for given application

post.description: Add CDN or Anycast endpoint to a container of given application.

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: The ID of the container template

400.description: Invalid input or endpoint name already exists.

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

get.description: Retrieves the current resource limits and usage for the authenticated user, including application counts and instance limits.
Lists all node IP addresses in the Magic Containers network.

post.description: Recreate a pod, deleting previous one.

403.description: User has invalid card or suspended.

get.description: Lists all available regions where applications can be deployed, including their anycast support and capacity status.
Returns the optimal base region for deployment based on the user's CDN server token location.

200.description: Optimal base region was successfully retrieved.

get.description: Retrieves the current region settings for an application, including allowed regions, required regions, and maximum allowed regions.

put.description: Updates the region settings for an application, including allowed regions, required regions, and maximum allowed regions.

403.description: User has invalid card or is suspended.

patch.description: Partially updates a volume template's configuration including name and size. Only provided fields will be updated.

delete.description: Deletes all volume instances for a volume template. All instances must be detached before deletion.

400.description: Some volume instances are not detached.

404.description: Volume template or instances not found.

get.description: Lists all volume templates and their instances for an application, including usage statistics.

post.description: Detaches a volume template from all application containers.

200.description: Volume was detached from the application.

404.description: Application or volume template not found.

delete.description: Deletes a specific volume instance. The volume must be detached before deletion.

400.description: Bad request due to invalid state or constraints.

404.description: Volume template or instance not found.

get.description: Get a list of all log-forwarding configurations for the authenticated user.

200.description: List of log-forwarding configurations retrieved successfully.

post.description: Create a new log forwarding configuration.

get.description: Get a specific log-forwarding configuration by ID.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: App ID for log forwarding configuration.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: App ID for log forwarding configuration.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: App ID for log forwarding configuration.

id.description: Absence of the id means it is a new container. Presence of the id means it is an update of the existing.

token.description: Token passed as field of syslog

format.description: Which Syslog RFC will be used

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

errors.description: Additional validation errors for field-specific issues.

registryId.description: The registry identifier. Can be "dockerhub", "github", or a private registry ID.
The registry identifier. Can be "dockerhub", "github", or a private registry ID.

serviceName.description: If this is not specified, the default behavior is to probe the server's overall health status.

registryId.description: The registry identifier. Can be "dockerhub", "github", or a private registry ID.
The registry identifier. Can be "dockerhub", "github", or a private registry ID.

token.description: Token passed as field of syslog

format.description: Which Syslog RFC will be used

registryId.description: The registry identifier. Can be "dockerhub", "github", or a private registry ID.

AccessKey.description: Please enter a valid personal API key.
AccessKey.name: AccessKey
